purpose: Ulm University, Germany, is announcing an open position for an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering. The application deadline is June 29, 2025, and interested candidates can apply through the provided online portal. The university seeks a candidate with an international track record in software engineering, who will contribute to both research and teaching. The position offers opportunities for interdisciplinary collaboration and includes support for a doctoral student. The university encourages qualified female scientists to apply and gives preferential consideration to severely disabled applicants.
